Backup
tiddlers.text:
Backup will push all data (including trashed tiddlers and the visible state) to a remote.
* <<backup.backupButton>>: Backup data
* <<backup.restoreButton>>: Restore all data (!will overwrite everything)

Note: In case you mess up we routinely make a local backup - press F12 and check under Application - Local Data

tiddlers.title: Synchronization
tiddlers.text:
Synchronization replicates local changes to a remote defined in [[$GeneralSettings]]:
* <<synch.test>>: Simulate a Synch
* <<synch.full>>: Run full synch (pull+push)
* <<synch.push>>: Push changes to remote
* <<synch.pull>>: Pull changes from remote
